name: Save Aiyaman in 20s
description:
This is just a simple game project to try out the DragonRuby Game Toolkit engine that was given out free for 20 Second Game Jam 2022 joiners. Jimmy is here to kill Aiyaman. You have 20 seconds to interact with the objects and save Aiyaman from death.

Use your mouse and click on objects. Find a combination that lets Aiyaman survive. Press 'R' at any time to reset the game.

Credits

This project in its entirety is under the CC0 public domain license. Source code can be found in GitHub.
